channel.title: [request] Track Builder
channel.description:
I was surprised when I searched for, but couldn't find, a simple plugin that generates minecart tracks for you. I'm thinking it would just generate them in the direction you were facing as far as you specify or that there is open ground. It would put 33 regular tracks, a sensor pad, a booster track, another sensor pad, and then repeat, until the number you specified is complete, or it hits a wall or something.
You could make it smarter by automatically tunneling for you, or handling inclines, or going through obstacles or the like, but none of that is necessary.
Anyone interested in making something like this?

item.title: [request] Track Builder
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Here, I’ll make it easy for everyone and ask them 9001 questions.

http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/how-do-i-destroy-blocks-or-a-specified-amount-of-blocks.61125/

Read full topic

item.title: [request] Track Builder
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Oh, I guess it could be used for the nether, but I also just meant in general. I just think it would be a cool plugin.

Read full topic

item.title: [request] Track Builder
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’m assuming this is for the nether, so as soon as we reset it it gets made before anyone builds (thinking this is to replace your track).

What else would it be for? We already basically have a train track to spawn in W1.

Read full topic

item.title: [request] Track Builder

item.title: [request] Track Builder
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Tom_BETA:

Can’t you just use world edit to make the tunnel thing and then place it yourself, it’s only 1000 blocks.

Yes, but world-edit wont consider hills, valleys, etc.

Read full topic
